entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind light except north 50 km/h over southern sections. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. A few rain showers beginning early in the afternoon. Wind light except north 50 km/h over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening and ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections early in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
